nodes.text: Roogar was a male Wookiee who lived during the time of the Galactic Republic. During the Clone Wars, he traveled to the city Tolea Biqua on the planet Genarius along with a group of other Wookiees, and they purchased large quantities of detonite and other explosives.
Roogar had a dark-colored stripe of fur running down the side of his body.
